alert.note: Alert for Carolina; San Juan; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 05 at 5:04PM ADT until September 05 at 6:15PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Carolina County in Puerto Rico... San Juan County in Puerto Rico... Trujillo Alto County in Puerto Rico... * Until 515 PM AST. * At 404 PM AST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Media reports also show flooding of Ave 65 de Infanteria in Rio Piedras. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
